publicGroups: We recommend mixing with other groups, but you can also have a private group.
groupOf30: For a group of 30 or more players, we ask for a deposit of $100 at the time of booking. At the event, you will be refunded if 30 players show up.
groupeOfLessThan30: For a group of less than 30 players, you can have a private group for $100 non refundable at the time of booking.
lastMinuteGroup: If you decide the day of to have a private group and we have staff available, the fee goes up to $200.
